alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 3:16AM CDT until March 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and South Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
